long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access InfiniGrow’s insights without leaving your workspace. Whether you’re a salesperson or a marketer, you can now get real-time, contextual journey insights about contacts, deals, or accounts, with just one click. Simplify your workflow by bringing InfiniGrow’s data to your fingertips, and get a 360 degree view of any account right from your CRM.

** How can it help you? **
 - Prepare for upcoming meetings by seeing what content, ads, or campaigns the account had engaged with recently
 - Understand the journey behind any deal/contact without having to leave your CRM
 - Create better ad copy, emails, and other collateral for ABM campaigns leveraging the added context of the accounts’ complete journey.

** How to use it?**
1. Visit any contact, deal, or account page on your CRM
2. Launch the InfiniGrow extension
3. See the full account journey
